article_title: Six months in The Land of Seniors baked brutal retirement truths into this visiting daughter

article_metadata.description: CC/Flickr/NiharbI could buy a first-class ticket for my mother if

og.description: Many Arizona retirees thought life in the eternal sun would be a heavenly thing indeed, only to find it a hot, well-lit, lonely space.
og.title: Six months in The Land of Seniors baked brutal retirement truths into this visiting daughter
